summary: The Boeing AH-64 Apache is an American attack helicopter used by the U.S. Army and other countries. It has two engines, a 30mm gun, and can carry missiles and rockets. The Apache can fly at night and has special sensors to find targets. It was first made by Hughes Helicopters and later by McDonnell Douglas and Boeing. Over 5,000 have been made and used in many wars, like those in the Middle East and Afghanistan. It's also used by countries like Greece, Japan, and the United Arab Emirates.
title: Boeing AH-64 Apache
